text.content:
Sly Flourish' 1d20 Lists for D&D Adventure Inspiration

Disclaimer: These rolltables were adapted from Mike Shea's (aka Sly Flourish) PDF shared on Twitter.  Shared and adapted with permission.

 

Rollable Tables
